name: The Pirate Bay - Ad remover
description:
Check out the original style at userstyles.org
Pretty quick and effective way to remove ads on The Pirate Bay. If you check this site frequently, you must acknowledge that those ads are irritating...
css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);



@-moz-document domain("thepiratebay.am"), domain("thepiratebay.gd"), domain("thepiratebay.mn"), domain("thepiratebay.vg"), domain("thepiratebay.la"),  domain("uploadbay.org") {iframe {display: none !important;}}
